#id=1
#text=I decided to bake a special cake for my mother 's birthday .
#id=2
#text=I gathered ingredients from my pantry that I had purchased earlier in the week .
#id=3
#text=I turned on the oven to let it preheat before starting to combine ingredients .
#id=4
#text=I took out a huge metal bowl from the cabinet , along with a wooden spoon and mixer to help mix the ingredients .
#id=5
#text=I put eggs , flour , sugar , cocoa powder , and butter into the metal bowl and mixed it with the electric mixer .
#id=6
#text=Then , I took out a food processor from the cabinet along with a carton of raspberries from the fridge .
#id=7
#text=I dumped all of the raspberries into the food processor along with a few spoonfuls of water and then turned it on .
#id=8
#text=I watched the raspberries become a smooth liquid .
#id=9
#text=I poured the liquid into the big bowl with the rest of the ingredients .
#text=I took out a square pan and greased it with the butter wrapper , and then put a light dusting of flour on the pan .
#text=Next , I poured the cake batter in the square pan and it was just enough .
#text=I put the pan into the oven and after about an hour , the cake was finished baking perfectly .
#text=I turned the oven off , and waited for the cake to cool for a few minutes .
#text=Then , I spread a jar of chocolate icing around the cake while it was still in the pan .
#text=I put it into the fridge and waited for my mother to get home .
